verses.verse: וַיּוֹלִכֵ֖נִי <S%H1980><s%> led אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַשָּׁ֑עַר <S%H8179><s%> me to the gate שַׁ֕עַר <S%H8179><s%> [even] the gate אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after פֹּנֶ֖ה <S%H6437><s%> that looketh דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> toward הַקָּדִֽים׃ <S%H6921><s%> the east

וְהִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold כְּבוֹד֙ <S%H3519><s%> And behold the glory אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> came מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> from the way הַקָּדִ֑ים <S%H6921><s%> of the east וְקוֹל֗וֹ <S%H6963><s%> and his voice כְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> [was] like a noise מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> of many וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the earth הֵאִ֥ירָה <S%H215><s%> shined מִכְּבֹדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3519><s%> with his glory

וּכְמַרְאֵ֨ה <S%H4758><s%> And [it was] according to the appearance הַמַּרְאֶ֜ה <S%H4758><s%> of the vision אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which רָאִ֗יתִי <S%H7200><s%> which I saw כַּמַּרְאֶ֤ה <S%H4758><s%> [even] according to the vision אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> that I saw בְּבֹאִי֙ <S%H935><s%> when I came לְשַׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> to destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> the city וּמַרְא֕וֹת <S%H4758><s%> [were] like the vision כַּמַּרְאֶ֕ה <S%H4758><s%> of the vision אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> that I saw אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> by נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> by the river כְּבָ֑ר <S%H3529><s%> Chebar וָאֶפֹּ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> and I fell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on פָּנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> upon my face

וּכְב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> And the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> into the house דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way שַׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> whose prospect דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [is] toward הַקָּדִֽים׃ <S%H6921><s%> the east

וַתִּשָּׂאֵ֣נִי <S%H5375><s%> took me up ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> So the spirit וַתְּבִיאֵ֕נִי <S%H935><s%> and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֶֽחָצֵ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַפְּנִימִ֑י <S%H6442><s%> me into the inner וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold מָלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> filled כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> and behold the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> the house

וָאֶשְׁמַ֛ע <S%H8085><s%> And I heard מִדַּבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> [him] speaking אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me מֵהַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> unto me out of the house וְאִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and the man הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become עֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> stood אֶצְלִֽי׃ <S%H681><s%> by me

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> of man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> the place כִּסְאִ֗י <S%H3678><s%> of my throne וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> and the place כַּפּ֣וֹת <S%H3709><s%> of the soles רַגְלַ֔י <S%H7272><s%> of my feet אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> I אֶשְׁכָּן־ <S%H7931><s%> where I will dwell שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> in it בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יְטַמְּא֣וּ <S%H2930><s%> no more defile ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> shall the house יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשִׁ֞י <S%H6944><s%> and my holy הֵ֤מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like וּמַלְכֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4428><s%> [neither] they nor their kings בִּזְנוּתָ֔ם <S%H2184><s%> by their whoredom וּבְפִגְרֵ֥י <S%H6297><s%> nor by the carcases מַלְכֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4428><s%> of their kings בָּמוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1116><s%> in their high places

בְּתִתָּ֨ם <S%H5414><s%> In their setting סִפָּ֜ם <S%H5592><s%> of their threshold אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סִפִּ֗י <S%H5592><s%> by my thresholds וּמְזֽוּזָתָם֙ <S%H4201><s%> and their post אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> by מְזוּזָתִ֔י <S%H4201><s%> my posts וְהַקִּ֖יר <S%H7023><s%> and the wall בֵּינִ֣י <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H996><s%> between וְטִמְּא֣וּ ׀ <S%H2930><s%> between me and them they have even defiled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשִׁ֗י <S%H6944><s%> my holy בְּתֽוֹעֲבוֹתָם֙ <S%H8441><s%> by their abominations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> that they have committed וָאֲכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> burn up אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּאַפִּֽי׃ <S%H639><s%> them in mine anger

עַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יְרַחֲק֧וּ <S%H7368><s%> far אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְנוּתָ֛ם <S%H2184><s%> their whoredom וּפִגְרֵ֥י <S%H6297><s%> and the carcases מַלְכֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4428><s%> of their kings מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> and I וְשָׁכַנְתִּ֥י <S%H7931><s%> from me and I will dwell בְתוֹכָ֖ם <S%H8432><s%> in the midst לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> of them for ever ס

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man הַגֵּ֤ד <S%H5046><s%> shew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> to the house וְיִכָּלְמ֖וּ <S%H3637><s%> that they may be ashamed מֵעֲוֹנֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5771><s%> of their iniquities וּמָדְד֖וּ <S%H4058><s%> and let them measure אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תָּכְנִֽית׃ <S%H8508><s%> the pattern

וְאִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> If נִכְלְמ֞וּ <S%H3637><s%> And if they be ashamed מִכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> of all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> they עָשׂ֗וּ <S%H6213><s%> of all that they have done צוּרַ֣ת <S%H6699><s%> them the form הַבַּ֡יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וּתְכוּנָת֡וֹ <S%H8498><s%> and the fashion וּמוֹצָאָ֡יו <S%H4161><s%> thereof and the goings out וּמוֹבָאָ֣יו <S%H4126><s%> thereof and the comings וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צֽוּרֹתָ֡ו <S%H6699><s%> in thereof and all the forms וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֻקֹּתָיו֩ <S%H2708><s%> thereof and all the ordinances וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all [צוּרֹתָי כ] (צ֨וּרֹתָ֤יו <S%H6699><s%> design ק) וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> whole [תֹּורֹתֹו כ] (תֹּורֹתָיו֙ <S%H8451><s%> bullock ק) הוֹדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> shew אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וּכְתֹ֖ב <S%H3789><s%> thereof and write לְעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> [it] in their sight וְיִשְׁמְר֞וּ <S%H8104><s%> that they may keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all צוּרָת֛וֹ <S%H6699><s%> thereof and all the forms וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all חֻקֹּתָ֖יו <S%H2708><s%> thereof and all the ordinances וְעָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> thereof and do אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> This [is] the law הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> Upon the top הָ֠הָר <S%H2022><s%> of the mountain כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> entire גְּבֻל֞וֹ <S%H1366><s%> the whole limit סָבִ֤יב ׀ <S%H5439><s%> thereof round about סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> around קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [shall be] most קָדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6944><s%> holy הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> Behold this [is] the law הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> of the house

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> and these מִדּ֤וֹת <S%H4060><s%> And these [are] the measures הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar בָּֽאַמּ֔וֹת <S%H520><s%> after the cubits אַמָּ֥ה <S%H520><s%> The cubit אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> [is] a cubit וָטֹ֑פַח <S%H2948><s%> and an hand breadth וְחֵ֨יק <S%H2436><s%> even the bottom הָאַמָּ֜ה <S%H520><s%> [shall be] a cubit וְאַמָּה־ <S%H520><s%> a cubit רֹ֗חַב <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth וּגְבוּלָ֨הּ <S%H1366><s%> and the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on שְׂפָתָ֤הּ <S%H8193><s%> thereof by the edge סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> thereof round about זֶ֣רֶת <S%H2239><s%> span הָאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> [shall be] a וְזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> and this גַּ֥ב <S%H1354><s%> and this [shall be] the higher place הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar

וּמֵחֵ֨יק <S%H2436><s%> And from the bottom הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [upon] the ground עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הָעֲזָרָ֤ה <S%H5835><s%> settle הַתַּחְתּוֹנָה֙ <S%H8481><s%> [even] to the lower שְׁתַּ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> [shall be] two אַמּ֔וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth אַמָּ֣ה <S%H520><s%> cubit אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> one וּמֵהֳעֲזָרָ֨ה <S%H5835><s%> settle הַקְּטַנָּ֜ה <S%H6996><s%> and from the lesser עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הָעֲזָרָ֤ה <S%H5835><s%> settle הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> [even] to the greater אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> [shall be] four אַמּ֔וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth הָאַמָּֽה׃ <S%H520><s%> [one] cubit

וְהַֽהַרְאֵ֖ל <S%H741><s%> and from the altar אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> [shall be] four אַמּ֑וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits [וּמֵהָאֲרִאֵיל כ] (וּמֵהָאֲרִיאֵ֣ל <S%H741><s%> the altar ק) וּלְמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward הַקְּרָנ֖וֹת <S%H7161><s%> horns אַרְבַּֽע׃ <S%H702><s%> [shall be] four

[וְהָאֲרִאֵיל כ] (וְהָאֲרִיאֵ֗ל <S%H741><s%> altar ק) שְׁתֵּ֤ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten אֹ֔רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> [cubits] long בִּשְׁתֵּ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> ten רֹ֑חַב <S%H7341><s%> broad רָב֕וּעַ <S%H7251><s%> square אֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> in אַרְבַּ֥עַת <S%H702><s%> in the four רְבָעָֽיו׃ <S%H7253><s%> squares

וְהָעֲזָרָ֞ה <S%H5835><s%> And the settle אַרְבַּ֧ע <S%H702><s%> in the four עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> teen אֹ֗רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> [cubits] long בְּאַרְבַּ֤ע <S%H702><s%> four עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen רֹ֔חַב <S%H7341><s%> broad אֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> in אַרְבַּ֣עַת <S%H702><s%> four רְבָעֶ֑יהָ <S%H7253><s%> squares וְהַגְּבוּל <S%H1366><s%> thereof and the border סָבִ֨יב <S%H5439><s%> about אוֹתָ֜הּ <S%H853><s%> חֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> it [shall be] half הָאַמָּ֗ה <S%H520><s%> a cubit וְהַֽחֵיק־ <S%H2436><s%> and the bottom לָ֤הּ אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> thereof [shall be] a cubit סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> about וּמַעֲלֹתֵ֖הוּ <S%H4609><s%> and his stairs פְּנ֥וֹת <S%H6437><s%> shall look קָדִֽים׃ <S%H6921><s%> toward the east

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> of man כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These חֻקּ֣וֹת <S%H2708><s%> These [are] the ordinances הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הֵעָֽשׂוֹת֑וֹ <S%H6213><s%> when they shall make לְהַעֲל֤וֹת <S%H5927><s%> it to offer עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and עוֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings וְלִזְרֹ֥ק <S%H2236><s%> thereon and to sprinkle עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and דָּֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> blood

וְנָתַתָּ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt give אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> to the priests הַלְוִיִּ֡ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who הֵם֩ <S%H1992><s%> are from מִזֶּ֨רַע <S%H2233><s%> that be of the seed צָד֜וֹק <S%H6659><s%> of Zadok הַקְּרֹבִ֣ים <S%H7138><s%> which approach אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me נְאֻ֛ם <S%H5002><s%> unto me saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD לְשָֽׁרְתֵ֑נִי <S%H8334><s%> unto me to minister פַּ֥ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> A young בָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> bull לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering

וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <S%H3947><s%> And thou shalt take מִדָּמ֗וֹ <S%H1818><s%> of the blood וְנָ֨תַתָּ֜ה <S%H5414><s%> thereof and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אַרְבַּ֤ע <S%H702><s%> [it] on the four קַרְנֹתָיו֙ <S%H7161><s%> horns וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and on אַרְבַּע֙ <S%H702><s%> of it and on the four פִּנּ֣וֹת <S%H6438><s%> corners הָעֲזָרָ֔ה <S%H5835><s%> of the settle וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and on הַגְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> and upon the border סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וְחִטֵּאתָ֥ <S%H2398><s%> thus shalt thou cleanse אוֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְכִפַּרְתָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H3722><s%> and purge

וְלָ֣קַחְתָּ֔ <S%H3947><s%> Thou shalt take אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> the bullock הַֽחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> also of the sin offering וּשְׂרָפוֹ֙ <S%H8313><s%> and he shall burn בְּמִפְקַ֣ד <S%H4662><s%> it in the appointed place הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַמִּקְדָּֽשׁ׃ <S%H4720><s%> the sanctuary

וּבַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> And on the second תַּקְרִ֛יב <S%H7126><s%> thou shalt offer שְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> a kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats תָּמִ֖ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish לְחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering וְחִטְּאוּ֙ <S%H2398><s%> and they shall cleanse אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> the altar כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> as they חִטְּא֖וּ <S%H2398><s%> as they did cleanse בַּפָּֽר׃ <S%H6499><s%> [it] with the bullock

בְּכַלּוֹתְךָ֖ <S%H3615><s%> When thou hast made an end מֵֽחַטֵּ֑א <S%H2398><s%> of cleansing תַּקְרִיב֙ <S%H7126><s%> [it] thou shalt offer פַּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> A young בָּקָ֣ר <S%H1241><s%> bull תָּמִ֔ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish וְאַ֥יִל <S%H352><s%> and a ram מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> out of the flock תָּמִֽים׃ <S%H8549><s%> without blemish

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֖ם <S%H7126><s%> And thou shalt offer לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> them before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְהִשְׁלִ֨יכוּ <S%H7993><s%> shall cast הַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> and מֶ֔לַח <S%H4417><s%> salt וְהֶעֱל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> upon them and they shall offer them up אוֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> עֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> [for] a burnt offering לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> Seven יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> days תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou prepare שְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> a goat חַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> [for] a sin offering לַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> every day וּפַ֧ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> A young בָּקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> bull וְאַ֥יִל <S%H352><s%> and a ram מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> out of the flock תְּמִימִ֥ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish יַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> they shall also prepare

שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> Seven יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days יְכַפְּרוּ֙ <S%H3722><s%> shall they purge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> the altar וְטִֽהֲר֖וּ <S%H2891><s%> and purify אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וּמִלְא֖וּ <S%H4390><s%> accomplish [יָדֹו כ] (יָדָֽיו׃ <S%H3027><s%> able ק)

וִֽיכַלּ֖וּ <S%H3615><s%> are expired אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> And when these days ס וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> become בַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֜י <S%H8066><s%> it shall be [that] upon the eighth וָהָ֗לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> and [so] forward יַעֲשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> shall make הַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עוֹלֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5930><s%> your burnt offerings וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁלְמֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H8002><s%> and your peace offerings וְרָצִ֣אתִי <S%H7521><s%> and I will accept אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> you saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD ס
